channel.title: Bill's Bicycle Adventures in France
channel.description: Bill's bicycle trip around France in the summer of 2019

item.title: Arrival in Toulouse
item.description: Made it to Toulouse! So far, thing are going well: I bought a biycle, got some theater tickets, and generally got oriented.

item.title: Maiden voyage
item.description: I got my wonderful new bicycle and took it out for a maiden voyage. Also, a quick trip to Carcassonne, a nice outing to a café-théâtre, and a wonderful meal at a restaurant called "the dirty brts."

item.title: Bastille day, and first long ride.
item.description: The first day's ride went pretty well, with a couple of wrong turns and some headwinds.

item.title: Too many kilometers!
item.description: I've gone too far, too fast; time to slow down.

item.title: Flat tire! Broken spoke! Rain! And some wonderful people...
item.description: I got a flat tire, and soon after noticed a broken spoke, on the peak day of the heat wave. Quite an afternoon! But it's all fixed now, and I met some wonderful people along the way.

item.title: Turning a corner
item.description: My trip turned a corner - I turned right at the Loire river. This took me to Nantes, home of the steampunk elephant.

item.title: The Angriest Château in the World
item.description: The château that is so angry it cannot move. It cannot eat. It cannot sleep. It can just barely growl. -- Bound so tightly with tension and anger, it approaches the state of rigor mortis.

item.title: The high point of my trip
item.description: Orléans marks the high point of my trip, in that it's the furthest point north. Also, I get to install a new tire, and a new luggage rack! And, I think I've reached peak tacos.
